attributes.action: Produce an itemized list of costs in the EU Divorce Bill
attributes.additional_details: The government is under pressure to pay the EU a massive charge in excess of the £20 billion suggested in the Prime Minister's Florence-Speech.
attributes.background: The House of Lords has declared that the UK has no LEGAL obligation to pay any 'divorce bill' to the EU as a consequence of BREXIT. It is may be acceptable for the UK to pay ongoing charges for schemes which require ongoing funding - for example R&D programs and the European Arrest warrant.
